release.note: Preparing for public release of source code. Making the VS project work without dependencies, adding docs, etc
Adding some more icons and reducing the .resources file to only those icons used instead of the whole of FamFamFam silk icon set!
I have added icons for a few more extensions: \*.a, \*.c, \*.exp, \*.htm, \*.html, \*.css, \*.bat, \*.api, \*.txt
